shows.title: Rod Serling's Legacy / Legends of Winter
shows.first_half: Producer and director Mark Scott Zicree explored the enduring legacy of Rod Serling and his iconic series, "The Twilight Zone." Followed by author Varla Ventura, on the rich and often chilling intersection of Christmas traditions and folklore.

shows.title: Natural Remedies / Exorcisms & Past Life Regressions
shows.first_half: First Half: Dr. Randi Shannon will discuss the many ways we can use natural remedies to help with ailments in addition to using modern medicine. Dr. Shannon believes that supplementation and natural remedies are essential when it comes to everyday health.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Psychic and paranormal researcher Richard Jackson will talk about The Exorcist movie and discuss his training with Father Robert McKenna, a world-recognized exorcist. Jackson will also discuss the 37 years of work he has done in the spiritual and paranormal fields, and past life regressions.

shows.title: Ancient Holiday Traditions / Miracle Open Lines
shows.first_half: First Half: Ordained Anglican Priest Lionel Fanthorpe will regale us with Christmas stories, and he'll also discuss the ancient midwinter feasts observed for millennia before the Christian Christmas. Fanthorpe will include information on Saint Nicholas and the Bishop of Myra in Turkey, who gave gifts to the poor. He'll explain the verses in the song The Twelve Days of Christmas, and treat us to many more holiday traditions and mysteries.
shows.second_half: Second Half: It's Miracle Open Lines! Give George a call on this magical night and talk about a miracle you've experienced.

shows.title: Christmas Miracles / Cheryll Jones Investigates
shows.first_half: First Half: Storyteller, filmmaker, and author Karen Kingsbury will discuss miracles and the holiday season. She'll show how at Christmastime we are more aware of miracles because we are more in tune with the sense of wonder that accompanies this magical time of year. Kingsbury will share several stories of miracles she researched for her latest book, reminding us that miracles still guide us today and let us know we are never alone.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Coast to Coast AM's investigative reporter Cheryll Jones will play her latest fascinating interview about strange and unexpected phenomena.

shows.title: Angelic Healing / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Angel communicator Susan Browne will explain how working with angels and their realms raises one's vibration, transforms limiting patterns, and creates greater wellbeing, clarity, and flow. She'll share stories from her work as a healer and offer simple practices that listeners can use immediately to feel more supported and spiritually connected. Followed by Open Lines—give Ryan a call and discuss whatever's on your mind!
